attributes.action: change the time at which school starts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is scientificly proven that teenagers work better in the afternoon, so we sugest school should begin at 11am and end at 5pm. This would improve the performance of teenagers at school and prevent teenagers from needing to travel to school in the dark in winter

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
